metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Pension may be stopped -- Hearing. History: Repealed 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 38, effective July 15, 1980. --Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2); and ch. 315, sec. 27. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 415b-23.
